    - cudatoolkit >=11.2
test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/arrow/api.h || (echo "arrow/api.h not found" && exit
      1)
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/arrow/acero/groupby.h || (echo "arrow/acero/groupby.h
      not found" && exit 1)
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/arrow/flight/types.h || (echo "arrow/flight/types.h
      not found" && exit 1)
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/arrow/flight/sql/api.h || (echo "arrow/flight/sql/api.h
      not found" && exit 1)
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/gandiva/engine.h || (echo "gandiva/engine.h not found"
      && exit 1)
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/parquet/api/reader.h || (echo "parquet/api/reader.h
      not found" && exit 1)
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_cuda.so
    - test ! -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_cuda.a
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow.so
    - test ! -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow.a
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_acero.so
    - test ! -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_acero.a
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_dataset.so
    - test ! -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_dataset.a
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_flight.so
    - test ! -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_flight.a
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_flight_sql.so
    - test ! -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_flight_sql.a
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_substrait.so
    - test ! -f $PREFIX/lib/libarrow_substrait.a
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libgandiva.so
    - test ! -f $PREFIX/lib/libgandiva.a
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libparquet.so
    - test ! -f $PREFIX/lib/libparquet.a
    - test -f $PREFIX/share/gdb/auto-load/$PREFIX/lib/libarrow.so.1200.0.0-gdb.py
about:
  home: http://github.com/apache/arrow
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file:
    - LICENSE.txt
  summary: C++ libraries for Apache Arrow
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: arrow-cpp
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
